  • Constructor Details

    • BettingFillingGame

      public BettingFillingGame(Filling[] symbols, int numberOfUsedSymbols, int seed, int bottleSize, int score, int bet, int maxPlays)
      Creates a BettingFillingGame object
      Parameters:
      symbols - the array of symbols with the symbols to be used in the game Table
      numberOfUsedSymbols - the number of different symbols to be used in the game Table
      seed - the seed for the Table Bottles content generator
      score - the score of the game at the moment
      bet - the amount of points that the player wants to bet
      maxPlays - the max plays that are allowed per round
      bootleSize - the size for the Bottle Tables
